column1: DIM_unciv_noble_arrest_desc;An overzealous foreign officer has overstepped his bounds! He has arrested a member of one of the most prominent noble families in our realm! This is against all rules and customs. The trail of nobles lies exclusively with us! Offended by this attack on their position and custom
column4: has taken up arms and started attacking western posts!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: DIM_unciv_noble_rebellion_desc;Following a rather tactless act of one of our colonial officers
column2: arresting an inlander head of a noble family is always a tactless act no matter how justified
column3: various noble families in $PROVINCENAME$ have set aside their differences and joined forces against us. Not just angry at their perceived offence
column4: they are also fearful of losing of their own position. They have now taken up arms together and attacked one of our posts! This act requires a responds!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
